import React, {useState} from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers'; import {Input, Label, Button, FormGroup} from 'reactstrap' import * as yup from "yup"; import HeavyEquipForm from './style.js' /* 라우터 주소 테스트용 컴포넌트 * 인자 설명 */ const HeavyEquipRegister = () => { const [type, setType] = useState('equip'); const [useyn, setUseyn] = useState('Y'); const [code, setCode] = useState(''); const [construction, setConstruction] = useState('phochen'); const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [modelname, setModelName] = useState(''); const [carnumber, setCarNumber] = useState(''); const [caridentify, setCarIdentify] = useState(''); const [manufacturer, setManufacturer] = useState(''); const [caryear, setCarYear] = useState(''); const [buydate, setBuyDate] = useState(''); const [uptime, setUptime] = useState(''); const schema = yup.object().shape({ name: yup.string().required(), model_name: yup.string().required(), car_number: yup.string().required(), car_identify: yup.string().required(), manufacturer: yup.string().required(), car_year: yup.string().required(), buy_date: yup.date().required(), uptime: yup.number().required() }); const { register, handleSubmit } = useForm({ resolver: yupResolver(schema), defaultValues: { type: 'equip', useyn: 'Y', construction: 'phochen' } }); const onSubmit = data => { console.log(JSON.stringify(data)); }; return (
장비 관리
장비/차량
사용여부
관리코드 시공현장
장비명 모델명
등록번호 차대번호
제조사 연식
구입일 구입가동시간
) } export default React.memo(HeavyEquipRegister)
